sentences.en: After a few tries Patrick had given up any attempt to reform his brother.

sentences.en: Before the land reform my family hadn't a single room or a strip of land.
sentences.cn: 土改前我家房无一间,地无一垄.

sentences.en: China has been hugely successful in efforts to reform its criminals.
sentences.cn: 中国改造罪犯的工作取得了巨大的成就.

sentences.en: Depressed economic conditions only momentarily paralyzed Roosevelt's reform impulses.
sentences.cn: 萧条的经济情况只是暂时遏制住罗斯福兴利除弊的劲头.

sentences.cn: 土改时每人领得一亩三分地.

sentences.en: I'm entering on my last reform -- I know it -- yes, and I'll win.
sentences.cn: 现在我是最后一次改过自新 -- 我知道 -- 真的, 我准能成功.

sentences.en: It is successful for us to research on the reform of farm tools.
sentences.cn: 我们对农具改进的研究取得了成功.

sentences.en: It was easy to PROMISE reform; indeed he had already promised it.
sentences.cn: 发誓洗心革面并不难, 其实他已经这样做了.

sentences.en: Prison Reform: for the benefit of the working class.

sentences.en: Reforms were made to revive the economy.

sentences.en: Since the land reform, the productive force has been developed.

sentences.cn: 威尔逊立法表上列于首位的是修改关税.

sentences.en: The party embarked on a programme of economic reform.
sentences.cn: 这个政党开始了一个经济改革的计划。

sentences.en: They carried out land reform in 1952.

sentences.cn: 我们应该尽量通过劳动改造罪犯,而不是惩罚他们.

sentences.en: When his court case was coming up, James promised to reform.
sentences.cn: 他的案子即将开审的时候，詹姆斯保证会改过自新。

sentences.en: You have had every chance to reform.
sentences.cn: 你已有了改过自新的各种机会.
